p: The choice of this specific plants used in this study was based on previous publications. After a literature review, we founded that some plants are used as green inhibitors of corrosion of metals in industry ( 19- 21). To our knowledge, no study has been carried out on orthodontic alloys. The choice of Artemesia and Celtis australis was based on previous studies that demonstrated an anticorrosive effect on other metals ( 22, 23). We also chose to test the anticorrosive effect of Clove (Syzygium aromaticum) essential oil and hydrosol for their antibacterial properties against oral bacteria and its widespread use in dental practice ( 24).
